characterProfiles.description: Male, Vietnamese. AGE: Mid-30s in present, late-20s/early-30s in memory (younger, clean-shaven). HEIGHT: 175cm. BUILD: Lean, slightly sinewy. FACIAL (PRESENT): Subtle stubble and tired under-eyes; expressive eyes. FACIAL (MEMORY): Clean-shaven, softer youthful features; moist eyes. HAIR: Short black hair, slightly messy. CLOTHING (PRESENT): Dark, worn long-sleeve shirt, muted tone, visible fabric texture; no accessories. CLOTHING (MEMORY): Simple light-colored shirt (linen/cotton texture), casual trousers; wind-reactive fabric. DISTINCTIVE FEATURES: Right hand is veined, slightly trembling; restrained grief; micro-tremors when overwhelmed. VOICE: No spoken dialogue in this project.

Female adult presence, only as a distant, semi-transparent silhouette in the memory field. FACIAL: Not readable (no clear facial detail). HAIR: Long, flowing outline suggested by backlight. CLOTHING: Indistinct dress-like shape formed by haze and light. DISTINCTIVE FEATURES: Ethereal, memory-like, softly flickering edges; never becomes fully solid. VOICE: None.

backgroundProfiles.description: Dark dusty attic interior filled with old objects and wooden shelves. Heavy particulate dust in the air, visible in a single narrow light shaft. Dim practical ambience, cold-to-neutral shadows, claustrophobic stillness. A wooden shelf holds an antique pocket watch with cracked glass.

Vast field of tall reeds at sunset (golden hour). Warm low sun near horizon creates strong backlight, glowing reed tips, and long soft shadows. Wind gently moves reeds in waves. Occasional wildflower petals drift through frame. Nostalgic, dreamlike atmosphere.
